content: in your ends your mon scarf is finished i d love to see your version of the mon scarf so please tag me @crochetdahlia #monscarf if you have any issues with the pattern please do not hesitate to contact me via email crochetdahliaofficial@gmail com or social media this pattern cannot be altered distributed or sold but items made from this pattern may be sold provided @crochetdahlia is acknowledged as the designer karen x 2
